trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of action that is expected

Levels.Mental: presentation of a short video with shapes interacting
Levels.Random: presentation of a short video with shapes moving randomly

stim_file.Description: Path and name of the video file presented

duration_stim.Description: duration of the stimulus in seconds

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

duration.Description: duration of the stimulus in seconds

response_time.Description: Time taken to provide the answer

countdown_stim.Description: If used, decreasing number shown on the screen during the get-ready phase of the task
